title: admin accounts
extract: DEFINITION of Administrative Accounting. Administrative accounting handles and reports internal factors and figures that influence decision making, operational control and managerial planning. ... Administrative accounting focuses on management planning and control to accomplish the company's administrative goals.May 18, 2018
